name: POP UP
description: POP UP = Positive-health Onsite Program for Unstably-housed Populations POP-UP specifically aims to reduce health disparities among homeless and unstably housed individuals living with HIV in San Francisco.. POP-UP is open five days a week: Monday to Friday afternoons. No appointment is necessary and patients in this program can come anytime any afternoon for care. POP-UP provides incentives for linkage and retention in care, enhanced patient outreach, and referral for emergency and permanent HI

howToGetIt: For more information or to contribute to this initiative, contact Elizabeth Imbert, MD email: elizabeth.imbert@ucsf.edu
